code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"./css/slider.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Slider(){const location=useLocation();const{images,title}=location.state||{images:[],title:"No Title"};const[slideIndex,setSlideIndex]=useState(0);const plusSlides=n=>{let newIndex=slideIndex+n;if(newIndex>=images.length)newIndex=0;if(newIndex<0)newIndex=images.length-1;setSlideIndex(newIndex);};const currentSlide=n=>{setSlideIndex(n);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"prev",onClick:()=>plusSlides(-1),children:"\u276E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[slideIndex],alt:"Slide ".concat(slideIndex+1)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"next",onClick:()=>plusSlides(1),children:"\u276F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:images.map((img,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"demo cursor ".concat(index===slideIndex?"active":""),src:img,alt:"Thumbnail ".concat(index+1),onClick:()=>currentSlide(index)}))})]})]});}
